Title: Provides for the suspension of a commercial driver's license if a driver has been convicted of a violation of local laws relating to a designated system of truck routes
Summary: Provides for the suspension of a commercial driver's license if a driver has been convicted of a violation of local laws relating to a designated system of truck routes.
LawCode: Amd ยง510-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing for the suspension of a commercial driver's license if a driver has been convicted of a violation of local laws relating to a designated system of truck routes
